tag_list: founder, startup, entrepreneurial-finance, startup-digest, startupweekly, apheleon, startup-forum
overview:
Seth Elliott is often viewed as a Venture Catalyst - an agent that provokes or speeds significant change or action.

Mr. Elliott has spent more than 15 years as a Senior Executive of (and Adviser to) growth enterprises. He has a history of successful leadership, strategic analysis and tactical implementation on behalf of emerging growth companies.

He has participated in raising more than $150 million in growth financing on behalf of client companies and was formerly (a) founder and President of Sneakers.com; (b) Interim Chief Financial Officer of Double Agent - a knowledge management software startup; and (c) Member of the Board of Directors of Copyright Control Services, an internet anti-piracy firm that he collaborated in selling to a publicly listed digital rights management firm.

He is currently SVP and Chief Strategy Officer of Engagement Media Technologies. He is also the founder of Pegasus Advisors - a consultancy that provides strategy, marketing and business development services.

Mr. Elliott was previously a founding Board Member of the Miami Innovation Fund - an angel investing organization whose members deploy capital into promising preseed companies.

He is the co-founder of The Startup Forum - a community organization designed to foster the growth of entrepreneurial ecosystems and he serves as the curator of The Startup Digest - Miami.
